scripts.preinstall: if [ "$SKIP_PREINSTALL" != "true" ]; then node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('pnpm') === -1) throw new Error('You must use pnpm to install dependencies')"; else echo 'Skipping preinstall script'; fi
scripts.start: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true webpack serve
scripts.start:visualizer: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true webpack serve
scripts.start:buildStats: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true webpack serve
scripts.start:visualizer:buildStats: cross-env BE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development INCLUDE_FEDERATION=true INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true webpack serve

scripts.lint: pnpm lint-js "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && pnpm lint-css "**/*.{css,scss}" && pnpm prettier .
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm lint-js:fix "**/*.{mts,cts,ts,tsx,mjs,cjs,js,jsx,mdx}" && pnpm lint-css:fix "**/*.{css,scss}" && pnpm prettier:fix .
scripts.storybook:build:visualizer:buildStats: cross-env STORY_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true storybook build
